languages.text: {n}Джай мягко улыбается.{/n} "Шерин, я никогда не грезила о том, чтобы принести клятвы над водой с человеком, чье сердце является половиной моего собственного. И обычаи людей, что стремятся заглянуть в мою постель и навести там свои порядки, мне не близки. Но ваша страстная натура порождает слишком много... двусмысленностей в вашей свите. Мы все время рядом, мы бьемся за ваше внимание, и это может породить вражду. Было бы правильно избавить всех нас от недопонимания".

{n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "Shereen, I never had any illusions about saying vows over water with someone whose heart was one half of my own. And I have little time for people who feel compelled to poke their nose into another's bed and assert their opinion on what's right and what's wrong. But your passionate self is stirring up too many... ambiguities in your retinue. All of us are packed together all the time, we vie for your attention, and it might lead to animosity. The right thing to do here would be to clear up any misconceptions."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай мягко улыбается.{/n} "Шерин, я никогда не грезила о том, чтобы принести клятвы над водой с человеком, чье сердце является половиной моего собственного. Мы все время рядом, мы бьемся за ваше внимание, и это может породить вражду. Было бы правильно избавить всех нас от недопонимания".

And I don't sympathise with people who feel compelled to poke their nose into another's bed and assert their opinion on what's right and what's wrong. But your passionate self is stirring up too many... ambiguities in your retinue. All of us are packed together all the time, we vie for your attention, and it might lead to animosity. The right thing to do here would be to help us deal with any misconceptions."

languages.text: {n}ジェイは優しく微笑んだ。{/n}「シャリーン、気持ちを分かち合った誰かと誓いを立てるなんて幻想、抱いたこともなかった。それにあたしには、他人のことに首を突っ込んで何が良くて何が間違ってるなんて言わなきゃ気が済まない奴らに割く時間なんてないんだ。でも、{name}様の情熱的な面が随行員の間で様々な…曖昧な状況を生み出してる。あたし達はみんな群れで行動してるだろ、いつも。だからみんな{name}様の注意を引きたがってんだ。それが禍根の種ってやつになるかもしれない。ここで取るべき正しい行動は、誤解を解くことじゃないか」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "Shereen, I never had any illusions about saying vows over water with someone whose heart was one half of my own. And I have little time for people who feel compelled to poke their nose into another's bed and assert their opinion on what's right and what's wrong. But your passionate self is stirring up too many... ambiguities in your retinue. All of us are packed together all the time, we vie for your attention, and it might lead to animosity. The right thing to do here would be to clear up any misconceptions."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは優しく微笑んだ。{/n}「シャリーン、気持ちを分かち合った誰かと誓いを立てるなんて幻想、抱いたこともなかった。それにあたしには、他人のことに首を突っ込んで何が良くて何が間違ってるなんて言わなきゃ気が済まない奴らに割く時間なんてないんだ。でも、{name}様の情熱的な面が随行員の間で様々な…曖昧な状況を生み出してる。あたし達はみんな群れで行動してるだろ、いつも。だからみんな{name}様の注意を引きたがってんだ。それが禍根の種ってやつになるかもしれない。ここで取るべき正しい行動は、誤解を解くことじゃないか」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊温柔地笑了起来。{/n}“亲爱的，我从来没想象过，会有人愿意与我在水面上许下誓言。至于有些人，他们总是乱管别人的私事，坚持以为只有自己明白什么是对，什么是错。我没时间去搭理他们，不过你充满激情的那一面，或许在你的随行人员之中激起了太多……含混不清的想法。我们所有人总是挤在一起，争夺你的注意力，这可能会导致爆发敌意。正确的做法应该是澄清一切可能的误解。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "Shereen, I never had any illusions about saying vows over water with someone whose heart was one half of my own. And I have little time for people who feel compelled to poke their nose into another's bed and assert their opinion on what's right and what's wrong. But your passionate self is stirring up too many... ambiguities in your retinue. All of us are packed together all the time, we vie for your attention, and it might lead to animosity. The right thing to do here would be to clear up any misconceptions."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊温柔地笑了起来。{/n}“亲爱的，我从来没想象过，会有人愿意与我在水面上许下誓言。至于有些人，他们总是乱管别人的私事，坚持以为只有自己明白什么是对，什么是错。我没时间去搭理他们，不过你充满激情的那一面，或许在你的随行人员之中激起了太多……含混不清的想法。我们所有人总是挤在一起，争夺你的注意力，这可能会导致爆发敌意。正确的做法应该是澄清一切可能的误解。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae sourit avec douceur.{/n} « Shereen, je ne me suis jamais fait la moindre illusion quant à l'éventualité de prononcer mes vœux avec un individu dont le cœur ne vaut pas la moitié du mien. Et je n'ai pas de temps à perdre avec les fouines qui se sentent obligées de fourrer leur nez dans les draps des autres pour mieux leur donner des leçons de morale. Cela étant dit, votre tempérament fougueux suscite un peu trop de... d'ambiguïtés parmi les membres de votre entourage. Nous vivons les uns sur les autres en permanence et cette rivalité amoureuse risque fort de semer la discorde entre nous. La meilleure chose à faire est donc de lever sur-le-champ les éventuels malentendus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "Shereen, I never had any illusions about saying vows over water with someone whose heart was one half of my own. And I have little time for people who feel compelled to poke their nose into another's bed and assert their opinion on what's right and what's wrong. But your passionate self is stirring up too many... ambiguities in your retinue. All of us are packed together all the time, we vie for your attention, and it might lead to animosity. The right thing to do here would be to clear up any misconceptions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae sourit avec douceur.{/n} « Shereen, je ne me suis jamais fait la moindre illusion quant à l'éventualité de prononcer mes vœux avec un individu dont le cœur ne vaut pas la moitié du mien. Et je n'ai pas de temps à perdre avec les fouines qui se sentent obligées de fourrer leur nez dans les draps des autres pour mieux leur donner des leçons de morale. Cela étant dit, votre tempérament fougueux suscite un peu trop de... d'ambiguïtés parmi les membres de votre entourage. Nous vivons les uns sur les autres en permanence et cette rivalité amoureuse risque fort de semer la discorde entre nous. La meilleure chose à faire est donc de lever sur-le-champ les éventuels malentendus. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae sonríe suavemente.{/n} «Shereen, nunca me he hecho ilusiones de pronunciar juramentos sobre agua con alguien cuyo corazón solo me pertenece a medias. Y no me gusta la gente que se entromete en lechos ajenos para decir lo que cree que está bien o mal. Pero sus pasiones están despertando demasiadas... ambigüedades en su séquito. Todos estamos demasiado apelotonados, luchamos por su atención y esto podría llevar a una mayor animosidad. Lo correcto sería despejar todas las dudas».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "Shereen, I never had any illusions about saying vows over water with someone whose heart was one half of my own. And I have little time for people who feel compelled to poke their nose into another's bed and assert their opinion on what's right and what's wrong. But your passionate self is stirring up too many... ambiguities in your retinue. All of us are packed together all the time, we vie for your attention, and it might lead to animosity. The right thing to do here would be to clear up any misconceptions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae sonríe suavemente.{/n} «Shereen, nunca me he hecho ilusiones de pronunciar juramentos sobre agua con alguien cuyo corazón solo me pertenece a medias. Y no me gusta la gente que se entromete en lechos ajenos para decir lo que cree que está bien o mal. Pero sus pasiones están despertando demasiadas... ambigüedades en su séquito. Todos estamos demasiado apelotonados, luchamos por su atención y esto podría llevar a una mayor animosidad. Lo correcto sería despejar todas las dudas».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae lächelt sanft.{/n} "Shereen, ich hatte nie Illusionen bezüglich irgendwelcher Gelübde über Wasser mit jemandem, dessen Herz eine Hälfte meines eigenen ist. Und ich habe keine Zeit für Leute, die ihre Nase in die Betten anderer Leute stecken und mit ihrer Meinung hausieren gehen, was richtig und was falsch ist. Aber Euer leidenschaftliches Ego sorgt für zu viele ... Unstimmigkeiten in Eurem Gefolge. Wir alle hängen die ganze Zeit zusammen, wir buhlen um Eure Aufmerksamkeit, und das kann zu Unstimmigkeiten führen. Richtig wäre an dieser Stelle, etwaige Fehleinschätzungen aufzuklären."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "Shereen, I never had any illusions about saying vows over water with someone whose heart was one half of my own. And I have little time for people who feel compelled to poke their nose into another's bed and assert their opinion on what's right and what's wrong. But your passionate self is stirring up too many... ambiguities in your retinue. All of us are packed together all the time, we vie for your attention, and it might lead to animosity. The right thing to do here would be to clear up any misconceptions."

Und ich habe keine Zeit für Leute, die ihre Nase in die Betten anderer Leute stecken und mit ihrer Meinung hausieren gehen, was richtig und was falsch ist. Aber Euer leidenschaftliches Ego sorgt für zu viele ... Unstimmigkeiten in Eurem Gefolge. Wir alle hängen die ganze Zeit zusammen, wir buhlen um Eure Aufmerksamkeit, und das kann zu Unstimmigkeiten führen. Richtig wäre an dieser Stelle, etwaige Fehleinschätzungen aufzuklären."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae zarifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Şirinim, ben hiçbir zaman yüreğinin yarısına sahip olduğum biriyle su kenarında evlilik yeminleri etme hayaline kapılmadım. Başkalarının yataklarında neler döndüğüne burnunu sokmak ve neyin doğru neyin yanlış olduğu hususundaki fikirlerini ortaya koymak zorunda hissedenlere ayıracak zamanımsa yok. Ancak senin o tutkulu benliğin, çok fazla... Muğlaklık ortaya çıkarıyor. Hepimiz her daim bir aradayız, ilgin için yarışıyoruz ve bu da husumete yol açabilir. Burada yapılacak doğru şey, tüm yanlış anlaşılmaları açıklığa kavuşturmak olur."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "Shereen, I never had any illusions about saying vows over water with someone whose heart was one half of my own. And I have little time for people who feel compelled to poke their nose into another's bed and assert their opinion on what's right and what's wrong. But your passionate self is stirring up too many... ambiguities in your retinue. All of us are packed together all the time, we vie for your attention, and it might lead to animosity. The right thing to do here would be to clear up any misconceptions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, zarifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Şirinim, ben hiçbir zaman yüreğinin yarısına sahip olduğum biriyle su kenarında evlilik yeminleri etme hayaline kapılmadım. Başkalarının yataklarında neler döndüğüne burnunu sokmak ve neyin doğru neyin yanlış olduğu hususundaki fikirlerini ortaya koymak zorunda hissedenlere ayıracak zamanımsa yok. Ancak senin o tutkulu benliğin, çok fazla... Muğlaklık ortaya çıkarıyor. Hepimiz her daim bir aradayız, ilgin için yarışıyoruz ve bu da husumete yol açabilir. Burada yapılacak doğru şey, tüm yanlış anlaşılmaları açıklığa kavuşturmak."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
